name: Super Red (peakr.io)
description:
Super Red is a challenging shooting game that forces you to use time wisely. You can slow down time when standstill and back to normal when moving. Use this ability to face your enemies. Super Red inspired by Super Hot but in 2D 

 How to play

You can control your character with WASD keys. Be careful, time will slow down when you do not move. When you move, time will be at normal speed.

Aim with your mouse and shoot with the left mouse button. 

You can face many enemies if you use your time wisely
